title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: CLI and Go library to pull, build, and run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and 30+ other models locally with GPU/CPU acceleration and an OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoint, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive REPL for Ollama with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat inside the editor.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, and pull models from Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; Spring Boot starters available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot component that talks to Ollama over fetch; published on npm as ollama-chatbot.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async/await, streaming, and strongly-typed chat requests; NuGet package OllamaSharp.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing an async client for Ollama with tokio and serde; published on crates.io.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and PVC model caching.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Community repo with ready-made docker-compose stacks for Ollama + Open WebUI + Postgres vector DB.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Lightweight Python microservice that exposes Ollama embedding models via REST and gRPC for vector DB ingestion.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 or GCP instances with Ollama server pre-installed.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: End-to-end RAG example using Ollama for both embeddings and generation, Chroma vector DB, and Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that injects an Ollama client as a provider; includes decorators for chat and embedding endpoints.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app providing Ollama model management, chat views, and admin integration; published on PyPI.
